definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: axe (√ unknown; cf. NH [[קַרְדּׂם]] double hoe,one side of which could split wood, Vogelst Land writhsch.37; Ar. qad=uwmun, qaduwm adze is loan-wd. acc. to Frä:84) ;—sf. [[קַרְדֻמּוֹ]] 1Sa 13:20 + Ju Jdg 9:48 (so prob. rd.for [[הַקַּרְדֻּמוֹתּ]], A LXXL t. a)ci/nhm, GFM Bu Now); pl. [[קַרְדֻּמִּים]] 1Sa 13:21, [[קַרְדֻּמוֹת]] Je 46:22, Ps 74:5
